name: reunite
description: App for reuniting families separated by natural disasters

scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.test: (cd server && npm test) && (cd client && npm test)
scripts.test:full: npm run test:components && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:components: (cd server && npm run test:full) && (cd client && npm test)
scripts.install: concurrently "(cd server && npm install)" "(cd client && npm install)"

author: Project Reunite
